```{r setup}
library(GeoPressureR)
```

Load data
```{r}
data("prob_map_list", package = "GeoPressureR")
data("raster_light_list", package = "GeoPressureR")
```


```{r}
for (i_s in seq_len(length(prob_map_list))){
  A=as.matrix(prob_map_list[[i_s]])spts <- rasterToPoints(r, spatial = TRUE)
  B=as.matrix(raster_light_list[[i_s]])
}
```
